name: 8ball

Ask Wolfram|Alpha all your geeky questions

name: announce
help:
Sends an announcement in the specified channel
Usage: db!announce <#channel> <message> [--noembed] [--thumbnail]
Aliases: db!announce1, db!announce2, db!announce3

name: autorole
help:
Sets the role that members get when they join the server
Usage: db!autorole <@role/disable>

name: avatar

Shows your avatar or the one for the specified user

name: b1nzy

name: ban
help:
Bans a user from the server (THIS WILL DELETE MESSAGES)
Usage: db!ban <@user> [-r Reason]

name: bassboost
help:
Sets the bass boost on the music player
Usage: db!bassboost <high/med/low/off>

name: bird
help:
Shows a bird
Usage: db!bird
Aliases: db!birb

name: blackandwhite
help:
Overlays a blackandwhite filter over the provided image
Usage: db!blackandwhite [image url]

name: blacklist
help:
Control the blacklisted words on your server
Note: People that have the kick members permission will bypass the blacklist
Usage: db!blacklist 
db!blacklist list => Gives you a list of the current blacklisted words
db!blacklist clear => Clears the blacklist
db!blacklist import => Imports an exported blacklist
db!blacklist add <word> => Adds a word to the blacklist
db!blacklist remove <word> => Removes a word from the blacklist

name: blur
help:
Overlays a blur filter over the provided image
Usage: db!blur [image url]

name: botinfo
help:
Displays some information about the bot
Usage: db!botinfo
Aliases: db!about, db!support, db!bi

name: captcha
help:
Checks if you are a robot
Usage: db!captcha <text>

help:
Delet this
Usage: db!carsandhentai

name: cat
help:
Shows a cat
Usage: db!cat
Aliases: db!kitty

name: changelog
help:
Shows the latest changelog from the bot
Usage: db!changelog

name: chat
help:
Have a chat with DuncteBot
Usage: db!chat <message>

name: cleanup
help:
Performs a purge in the channel where the command is run.
To clear an entire channel it's better to use db!purgechannel
Usage: db!cleanup [amount] [--keep-pinned] [--bots-only]
Aliases: db!clear, db!purge, db!wipe

name: clint
help:
Shows a picture of Clint staring at something on a monitor.

name: customcommand
help:
Create, edit and delete custom commands
Usage: db!customcommand list => Shows a list of all the custom commands
db!customcommand new <name> <text> => Creates a new custom command
db!customcommand edit <name> <text> => Edits a custom command
db!customcommand raw <name> => Shows the raw value of a custom command
db!customcommand delete <name> => Deletes a custom command`
Aliases: db!cc, db!customcommands

name: issue
help:
Reports heavy and weird issues to the developers.
This will create an invite to your server, so we can join and help you directly.
Those issues are hard to explain / resolve if we can't see nor read the chat or other things that happen.
Usage: db!issue <issue json> (issue can be generated at https://dunctebot.com/issuegenerator)`
Aliases: db!bug, db!bugreport

even if you have administrator permission_

name: remind
help:
Creates a reminder for you, add --channel to remind you in the current channel
Usage: db!remind <reminder> -t <number><w/d/h/m/s>
Example: db!remind Clean your room :/ -t 1d5m

name: search
help:

name: seek
help:
Seek in the currently playing track
Examples: db!seek 04:20
db!seek 00:50
db!seek 120
Usage: db!seek <minutes:seconds> / db!seek [-]<seconds>
Aliases: db!jump, db!jumpto, db!jp

name: serverjoins
help:
Shows a graph with the joins for this server.
This is not a full history as it only looks at the members that are currently in the server.
Usage: db!serverjoins

name: setcolor
help:
Sets the color of the embeds that the bot sends
Usage: db!setcolor <hex color>
Aliases: db!setembedcolor

name: setdescription
help:
Sets a custom description viewable in db!serverinfo

name: setjoinmessage
help:
Sets the message that the bot shows when a new member joins
Usage: db!setjoinmessage <join message>

name: setleavemessage
help:
Sets the message that the bot shows when a member leaves
Usage: db!setleavemessage <leave message>

name: setlogchannel
help:
Sets the channel for the modlogs
Usage: db!setlogchannel <#channel/disable>

name: setprefix
help:
Sets the new prefix to use on this server
Usage: db!setprefix <prefix>

name: setpronouns
help:
Set your pronouns to people can check them with db!pronounscheck
Examples of pronouns are:
they/them/their/theirs
she/her/her/hers
he/him/his/his
ze/zir/zir/zirs
xe/xir/xir/xirs

Usage: db!setpronouns <pronouns> [--plural]

name: setratelimits
help:
Sets our cooldown in minutes for un-muting your spammer of choice.
Example: db!setratelimits 20|45|60|120|240|2400
Usage: db!setratelimits <1|2|3|4|5|6/default>

name: settings
help:
Shows the current settings for this server

Usage: db!setwelcomechannel <#chanel>
Aliases: db!setleavechannel, db!setwelcomeleavechannel

Stops the music

Suggest a new feature for DuncteBot!

name: tag
help:
Stores some text for later usage
Tags follow the same parsing as custom commands and the join/leave messages
Usage: db!tag <tag-name/raw/author/delete/create/help> [tag-name] [tag content]
Aliases: db!pasta, db!tags, db!t

name: tempban
help:
Temporally bans a user from the server (THIS WILL DELETE MESSAGES)
Usage: db!tempban <@user> <time><w/d/h/m/s> [-r Reason]

name: tempmute
help:
Temporally mutes a user in the server, this will override any existing tempmutes for the user
Usage: db!tempmute <@user> <time><w/d/h/m/s> [-r reason]

name: testflag
help: Usage: db!testflag

name: testtag
help:
Test your jagtag format before you save it as custom command etc.
Usage: db!testtag <JagTag syntax>

name: thesearch
help:
Go on a journey to find intelligent life
Usage: db!thesearch <text>

name: toggleannouncetracks
help:
Toggles if the bot should announce the next playing track

name: toggleautodehoist
help:
Toggles if the bot should auto de-hoist users
Usage: db!toggleautodehoist

name: togglefilterinvites
help:
Toggles if the bot should delete messages that contain invite links

name: togglejoinmessage
help:
Turns the join message on or off
Usage: db!togglejoinmessage
Aliases: db!enablejoinmessage, db!disablejoinmessage

name: togglekickmode
help:

name: togglespamfilter
help:
Toggles whether we should handle your incoming spam

help:
Turns the swearword filter on or off.
The default filter type is Very Toxic, this can be changed on the dashboard
Usage: db!toggleswearfilter
Aliases: db!enableswearfilter, db!disableswearfilter

name: token
help:
Deconstructs a token to get as much information as possible from it
Usage: db!token <token of a discord bot>

name: translate

name: trash

name: trigger

Gives a role to a user when they join a specified voice channel

you need more WAM!
